case.state: {small}Yo, this is a legit request from the writer to the devs. Make more lore goddamnit! or at least give your characters actual things to say. I had to search through memes and fanon to write most of the dialogue. Beat Girlfriend and then play with her again, and you'll see what I came up with. But I'd really prefer to have actual canon things to take away from.{!reset}

Hey, your voice sounds really similar to mine! What's up with that?
... I-I mean,
that's how you do it!
I hope this doesn't take too long. I invited my Boyfriend's ex over tonight, and they said they'd focus on me this time...
Hey there, it's ya girl. Back at it again. Checkin' this place out for my other Newground buddies.
Left, up, down, right!
Down, down, up! Down, down, right!
